rows.label: qst710402_msg0001
rows.name:
Ugh, to think that fool
would get a girlfriend...

rows.label: qst710402_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, it's you all. Thanks
for your help with Leo.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0003
rows.name:
What? Someone wants to join
us? And it's a girl...?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0004
rows.name: Spring has finally come for me...!

rows.label: qst710402_msg0005
rows.name:
No, wait. If I get carried
away and misunderstand, I'll
end up just like that fool...

rows.label: qst710402_msg0006
rows.name:
I don't mean to distrust
you, but please let me
give you a little test.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0007
rows.name:
No, it's simple. First, I'll
ask you a few questions.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0008
rows.name:
You just have to answer them
based on how much passion
she has as a performer.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0009
rows.name:
Based on your answers,
I'll judge whether she's
suited to be a performer.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0010
rows.name: Alright, here I go.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0101
rows.name:
Have you confirmed the passion of
the one who wants to join us?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0102
rows.name: Well then, let me ask you again.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0201
rows.name:
Does she have any skills or
talents she's proud of?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0202
rows.name: She's good at playing the flute.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0203
rows.name: Nothing at all.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0301
rows.name:
Oh, the flute? If we add the unique
sound of that wind instrument, it might
give us a more lively impression.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0302
rows.name: Alright, on to the next question.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0401
rows.name: Does she like being in front of people?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0402
rows.name:
Usually not, but it's a pleasure
when she's performing.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0403
rows.name:
She's too shy to be in
front of people at all.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0501
rows.name: Ah, I understand that well.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0502
rows.name:
I don't usually stand out either, but when
I'm performing, there are times I want to be
the center of attention more than anyone.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0503
rows.name: Then how about a case like this?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0601
rows.name:
Would she be okay with being
away from Iira for a long time?

rows.label: qst710402_msg0602
rows.name:
She wants to visit various
cities and countries.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0603
rows.name:
She doesn't want to
leave her house at all.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0701
rows.name: I see, so that's how it is...

rows.label: qst710402_msg0702
rows.name:
...Yes, she passes. I think she's
perfect for a traveling performer.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0703
rows.name:
In fact, as a performer, she
seems like she'd be a much
better asset than Leo.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0704
rows.name:
Go tell her right away. From
today, she's one of us!

rows.label: qst710402_msg0705
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]A girl, huh? I wonder what
she's like... Heh heh heh...

rows.label: qst710402_msg0801
rows.name:
I see. If that's really the
case, I'm afraid she's not
suited to be a performer.

rows.label: qst710402_msg0802
rows.name:
I'll be here for a while,
so please go and confirm
her passion properly.
